date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2021
name: JEUP
review_text:
El paquete llegó antes de lo mencionado, es fácil de leer.
Lo único en contra es que la cuerda le dura un poco menos de 24 hrs.
title: Buen reloj mecánico

date: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2013
name: Charlie
review_text: I was given this as a present( I prefer to carry pocket watches as opposed to wearing a wrist watch), and at first glance I was pleased. It appeared solid and I liked the face. However it did not last even six hours. I did not over wind it just stopped, never to work again. Buyer be ware.
title: Not Quality

date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2013
name: JONATHAN GUILLEN
review_text: This watch is awesome, the winding up mechanisn works wonders and it has a lifetime warranty, really good as a gift... Incredible, just incredible
title: Best watch ever

date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2017
name: Ivan Idea
review_text: I've had a Charles Hubert model 3571 for a couple years that I love, so I decided to try CH's mechanical watches. I chose the 3841-WR because it has a full dial instead of a skeleton dial; I didn't want the distraction of the gears when checking the time. I think I chose well-- the 3841 is an elegant, uncluttered, handsome watch. It has a nice, solid weight to it, and the action on the hunter cover works well. The crown and bow are at 3 o'clock, which allows me to hold it naturally, thumb it open and read the dial upright. Winding it at bedtime keeps it going through the night without an appreciable difference from my battery watches come morning. I wind it again in the morning, with a touch up about mid-day. I do wish there were a hack to stop the second hand so I could synchronize it more precisely with my other watches; as it is, the second hand starts counting the moment there's power in the mainspring. But I'm happy with my choice-- the 3841 is simple without being plain, and functions nicely.
title: An Elegant, Elementary Timepiece

date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2014
name: Collin L Geer
review_text: The first and hopefully the last item I returned, it worked one or two hours and then it would stop.
title: the only item i've ever returned!
